            class Admin::CalendarsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_superadmin!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_calendar, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]
          
      5.

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Definir o mês e ano atual ou baseado nos parâmetros
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @current_month = @current_date.beginning_of_month
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @current_year = @current_date.year
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos do mês atual
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                month_start = @current_month.beginning_of_month
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                month_end = @current_month.end_of_month
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @calendars = Calendar.includes(:school)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                    .where(date: month_start..month_end)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @calendars = @calendars.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                                              "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

                if params[:calendar_type].present?

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

                # Agrupar eventos por data para facilitar a exibição no calendário

                # Dados para os filtros

    39.

    40. 
            

            

                @calendar_types = Calendar::CALENDAR_TYPES

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # Calcular navegação do calendário

    43. 
            

            

                @prev_month = @current_month - 1.month
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                @next_month = @current_month + 1.month

                @calendar = Calendar.new

              def create
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                @calendar = Calendar.new(calendar_params)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                if @calendar.save
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  # Se for um evento municipal (para todas as escolas)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  if @calendar.all_schools?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    School.find_each do |school|
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      Calendar.create!(
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        title: @calendar.title,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        description: @calendar.description,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                        date: @calendar.date,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        calendar_type: @calendar.calendar_type,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        school: school,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        all_schools: false # Cópias específicas para cada escola
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      )
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_calendars_path,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                                notice: "Evento municipal adicionado ao calendário de todas as escolas com sucesso."
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_calendars_path,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                                notice: "Evento adicionado ao calendário com sucesso."
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  @schools = School.order(:name)

              def update
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                if @calendar.update(calendar_params)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_calendar_path(@calendar),
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                              notice: "Evento do calendário atualizado com sucesso."
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                else
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  @schools = School.order(:name)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  @calendar_types = Calendar::CALENDAR_TYPES
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  render :edit
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                if @calendar.municipal?
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # Se for municipal, remove também as cópias das escolas
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  Calendar.where(
          
      128.

                    title: @calendar.title,

                # Estatísticas gerais municipais

                # Distribuição de alunos por escola

                @students_by_school = School.joins(:students)

    14. 
            

            

                                            .where(users: { user_type: "student" })
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                            .group("schools.name")

              private
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def calculate_general_attendance_rate
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(user_type: "student").count
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_students.zero?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.where("date >= ?", 30.days.ago).count
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                return 95.0 if total_absences.zero?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                attendance_rate = [ 100.0 - (total_absences.to_f / total_students * 10), 0 ].max
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                attendance_rate.round(1)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_summary
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                School.joins(:students)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      .where(users: { user_type: "student" })
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      .group("schools.name")
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      .average("100 - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absences WHERE absences.user_id = users.id AND absences.date >= '#{30.days.ago.to_date}') * 10")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            end
          
      54.

            class Admin::DocumentsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :authorize_superadmin!

              before_action :set_document, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy, :download ]

              def index

                @documents = Document.includes(:school).all
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros de busca
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?

    11. 
            

            

                  @documents = @documents.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ? OR file_name ILIKE ?",
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                               "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")

    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14.

    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                if params[:school_id].present?
          
      20.

                  @documents = @documents.where(school_id: params[:school_id])

    21.

                @documents = @documents.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @schools = School.order(:name)
          
      25.

      26.

              end

              def show

              def new
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @document = Document.new
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @schools = School.order(:name)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def create
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @document = Document.new(document_params)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Processar upload de arquivo se presente
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if params[:document][:file].present?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  uploaded_file = params[:document][:file]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @document.file_name = uploaded_file.original_filename
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Criar diretório se não existir
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  upload_dir = Rails.root.join("storage", "documents")
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(upload_dir) unless Dir.exist?(upload_dir)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Salvar arquivo com nome único
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  original_filename = uploaded_file.original_filename.to_s
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  file_extension = File.extname(original_filename).downcase
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # Validar extensão do arquivo
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  allowed_extensions = %w[.pdf .doc .docx .txt .jpg .jpeg .png .gif]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  unless allowed_extensions.include?(file_extension)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    @document.errors.add(:file, "Tipo de arquivo não permitido")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    render :new and return
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  unique_filename = "#{SecureRandom.uuid}#{file_extension}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  file_path = upload_dir.join(unique_filename)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  File.open(file_path, "wb") do |file|
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    file.write(uploaded_file.read)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  @document.file_path = file_path.to_s

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68.

                if @document.save

                  # Se for um documento municipal (para todas as escolas)

            class Admin::MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              def index

              def message_params

              def handle_broadcast_message
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                success_count = 0
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                error_count = 0
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                recipients = get_broadcast_recipients
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                recipients.each do |recipient|
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  message = current_user.sent_messages.build(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    subject: params[:message][:subject],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    body: params[:message][:body],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    recipient: recipient,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    school: recipient.school || School.first
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  if message.save
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    success_count += 1
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    error_count += 1
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                if error_count == 0
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_messages_path,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                              notice: "Comunicado enviado com sucesso para #{success_count} destinatários."
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                else
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_messages_path,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                              alert: "#{success_count} mensagens enviadas, #{error_count} falharam."
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80.

              def get_broadcast_recipients
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                case params[:broadcast_type]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                when "all_schools"

    83.

    88. 
            

            

                  school.users.where.not(id: current_user.id)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90.

      91.

              def attendance_report
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @schools = School.includes(:users)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Calcular taxa de presença por escola (implementação básica)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @attendance_by_school = @schools.map do |school|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  total_students = school.users.student.count
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  total_absences = Absence.joins(:user).where(users: { school_id: school.id }).count
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Assumindo 200 dias letivos por ano
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  expected_presences = total_students * 200
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  actual_presences = expected_presences - total_absences
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = expected_presences > 0 ? (actual_presences.to_f / expected_presences * 100).round(2) : 0
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    school: school,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    students: total_students,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    absences: total_absences
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65.

            class Admin::SchoolsController < ApplicationController

              def create

              def update

              def destroy

                redirect_to admin_schools_path, notice: "Escola excluída com sucesso."
          
      48.

              def backup_system
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                begin
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  backup_filename = "backup_#{Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')}"

    67. 
            

            

                  backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")

      69.

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(backup_path)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  # Backup do banco de dados
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  if perform_database_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # Backup dos arquivos

    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77.

                    redirect_to admin_settings_path, notice: "Backup realizado com sucesso: #{backup_filename}"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_settings_path, alert: "Erro ao realizar backup do banco de dados."
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                rescue => e

              def generate_secure_password
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # Gerar senha segura com letras, números e símbolos
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                chars = ("a".."z").to_a + ("A".."Z").to_a + (0..9).to_a + [ "!", "@", "#", "$", "%" ]
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                (0...12).map { chars.sample }.join
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118.

              def save_calendar_settings(calendar_params)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Implementar salvamento das configurações do calendário
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Pode ser salvo em um arquivo de configuração ou tabela do banco
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                true
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124.

              def get_calendar_settings
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # Obter configurações atuais do calendário
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                {
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  start_date: Date.current.beginning_of_year,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  end_date: Date.current.end_of_year,
          
      130.

      133.

              def perform_database_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                case ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.adapter
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when "sqlite3"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  database_path = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  backup_file = backup_path.join("#{backup_filename}.sqlite3")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.cp(database_path, backup_file)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  true
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                when "postgresql"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  # Implementar backup PostgreSQL
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  database_name = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  system("pg_dump", database_name, out: "#{backup_path}/#{backup_filename}.sql")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                when "mysql2"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  # Implementar backup MySQL
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  database_name = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  system("mysqldump", database_name, out: "#{backup_path}/#{backup_filename}.sql")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                else
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  false
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                false
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def perform_files_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # Backup dos arquivos importantes (uploads, storage, etc.)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                storage_path = Rails.root.join("storage")
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                backup_storage = backup_path.join("#{backup_filename}_storage.tar.gz")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                system("tar", "-czf", backup_storage.to_s, "-C", Rails.root.to_s, "storage") if Dir.exist?(storage_path)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def calculate_disk_usage
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                begin
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  size = `du -sh #{Rails.root}`.split.first
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  size || "N/A"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def calculate_database_size
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                begin
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  case ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.adapter
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  when "sqlite3"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    database_path = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    size_bytes = File.size(database_path)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    format_file_size(size_bytes)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  else
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    "N/A"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def format_file_size(size_bytes)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                units = %w[B KB MB GB TB]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                size = size_bytes.to_f
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                unit_index = 0
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                while size >= 1024 && unit_index < units.length - 1
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  size /= 1024.0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  unit_index += 1
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197.

              def get_last_backup_date
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                return "Nunca" unless Dir.exist?(backup_path)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                backup_files = Dir.glob(backup_path.join("*"))

    206. 
            

            

                return "Nunca" if backup_files.empty?
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                latest_backup = backup_files.max_by { |f| File.mtime(f) }

                File.mtime(latest_backup).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M")

              def get_recent_backups

                backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")

              def get_system_uptime
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                begin
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  uptime_seconds = File.read("/proc/uptime").split.first.to_f
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  days = (uptime_seconds / 86400).to_i
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  hours = ((uptime_seconds % 86400) / 3600).to_i
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  minutes = ((uptime_seconds % 3600) / 60).to_i
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  "#{days}d #{hours}h #{minutes}m"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      238.

              def after_sign_in_path_for(resource)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "REDIRECT DEBUG: User type is #{resource.user_type}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                case resource.user_type
          
      35.

                when "admin"

              def ensure_direction!

              def class_schedule_params

              def build_schedule_grid(schedules)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                grid = {}
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                (1..6).each do |day|
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  grid[day] = schedules.select { |s| s.weekday == day }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                                      .sort_by(&:start_time)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                grid
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            end

    5.

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

    8.

              def update
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                if @classroom.update(classroom_params)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_classroom_path(@classroom), notice: "Turma atualizada com sucesso."
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                else
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  render :edit
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                @classroom.destroy
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                redirect_to direction_classrooms_path, notice: "Turma removida com sucesso."
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def add_student
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                @student = User.find(params[:user_id])
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if @student.update(classroom: @classroom)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_classroom_path(@classroom), notice: "Aluno adicionado à turma com sucesso."
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_classroom_path(@classroom), alert: "Erro ao adicionar aluno à turma."
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def remove_student
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                @student = User.find(params[:student_id])
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                if @student.update(classroom: nil)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_classroom_path(@classroom), notice: "Aluno removido da turma com sucesso."
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                else
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_classroom_path(@classroom), alert: "Erro ao remover aluno da turma."
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79.

              def set_classroom
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                @classroom = current_user.school.classrooms.find(params[:id])
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              end
          
      86.

              def classroom_params

    89.

      90.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_direction!

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                load_dashboard_data
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Erro no dashboard da direção: #{e.message}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")

    11.

              def refresh_data
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                load_dashboard_data
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  total_students: @total_students,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  total_teachers: @total_teachers,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  total_classrooms: @total_classrooms,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  total_subjects: @total_subjects,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate: @attendance_rate,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  average_grade: @average_grade,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  total_messages: @total_messages,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              rescue => e

              def load_dashboard_data
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Estatísticas básicas
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @total_students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                     .distinct.count
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @total_teachers = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher").count
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                @total_classrooms = Classroom.where(school_id: @school.id).count
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                @total_subjects = Subject.joins(:classroom).where(classrooms: { school_id: @school.id }).distinct.count
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Eventos próximos (próximos 7 dias)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                @upcoming_events = Event.where(school_id: @school.id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                                       .where("start_date >= ? AND start_date <= ?", Date.current, 7.days.from_now)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                                       .order(:start_date)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                                       .limit(5)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Avisos e notificações importantes
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @important_notifications = get_important_notifications
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Relatórios gerais
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @attendance_rate = calculate_attendance_rate
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @average_grade = calculate_average_grade
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                @total_messages = calculate_total_messages
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Alertas e avisos

              def generate_school_alerts
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                alerts = []
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                # Taxa de frequência baixa
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                attendance_numeric = @attendance_rate.to_f if @attendance_rate != "N/A"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                if attendance_numeric && attendance_numeric < 75
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  alerts << {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    type: "danger",
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149.

      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    message: "A taxa de frequência da escola está em #{@attendance_rate}%, abaixo do recomendado (85%)"
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # Turmas sem disciplinas cadastradas

                if classrooms_without_subjects > 0
          
      160.
