    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Verificar conflitos de horários
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                conflicting_schedules = ClassSchedule.where(school_id: @school.id, active: true)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                                                    .group(:classroom_id, :weekday, :start_time)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                                                    .having("COUNT(*) > 1")
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                                                    .count
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                if conflicting_schedules.any?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  alerts << {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    type: "danger",
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    title: "Conflitos de Horário",
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    message: "Existem #{conflicting_schedules.size} conflito(s) na grade de horários"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  }
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                alerts
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              private
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                # Calculando taxa de frequência baseada nas ausências dos últimos 30 dias
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student").count
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                return "N/A" if total_students.zero?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                # Corrigindo o join - usar :student ao invés de :user
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:student)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                                       .where("absences.date >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                # Se não há ausências registradas nos últimos 30 dias, verificar se há ausências antigas
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                if total_absences.zero?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  all_absences = Absence.joins(:student).where(users: { school_id: @school.id }).count
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  if all_absences.zero?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    return "N/A"  # Não há dados de frequência
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  else
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    # Há ausências registradas, mas não recentes - assumir boa frequência
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    return "95.0"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                # Calculamos uma estimativa mais realista
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                # Assumindo 22 dias letivos por mês (excluindo fins de semana)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                expected_presences = total_students * 22
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                actual_presences = expected_presences - total_absences
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                # Garantir que não seja negativo e arredondar para 1 casa decimal
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                attendance_rate = [ (actual_presences.to_f / expected_presences * 100), 0.0 ].max.round(1)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                # Se a taxa calculada for muito alta (>100%), limitar a 98%
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                [ attendance_rate, 98.0 ].min.to_s
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              def calculate_average_grade
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                # Corrigindo o join - usar :student ao invés de :user
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.joins(:student)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                              .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                              .where("grades.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                # Se não há notas recentes, verificar se há notas antigas
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                if grades.empty?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  all_grades = Grade.joins(:student).where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  if all_grades.empty?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    return "N/A"  # Não há notas cadastradas
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  else
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    # Usar a média de todas as notas se não há notas recentes
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    average = all_grades.average(:value) || 0
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                    return average.round(1).to_s
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                average = grades.average(:value) || 0
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                average.round(1).to_s
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              def calculate_total_messages
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                # Contando mensagens enviadas pelos usuários da escola nos últimos 30 dias
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                # Verificar se a associação :sender existe no modelo Message
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                begin
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  Message.joins(:sender)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                         .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                         .where("messages.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                         .count
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid, ActiveRecord::AssociationNotFoundError => e
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  # Se houver erro na associação, contar mensagens de forma alternativa
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Erro ao calcular mensagens: #{e.message}"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  # Tentar contagem alternativa usando sender_id
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  Message.where(sender_id: User.where(school_id: @school.id).pluck(:id))
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                         .where("created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                         .count
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Erro crítico ao calcular mensagens: #{e.message}"
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  0 # Retorna 0 em caso de erro
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

              end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

            end
          
      266.

    app/controllers/direction/documents_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    96 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 96 lines missed.

            class Direction::DocumentsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @documents = Document.where(school: @school)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                                    .includes(:user)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                    .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @documents = @documents.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                               "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if params[:document_type].present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  @documents = @documents.where(document_type: params[:document_type])
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                if params[:user_type].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  @documents = @documents.joins(:user).where(users: { user_type: params[:user_type] })
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                @documents = @documents.limit(50) # Limitar a 50 resultados por enquanto
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @document_types = Document.distinct.pluck(:document_type).compact
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def show

                @document = Document.find(params[:id])

    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32.

                # Verificar se o documento pertence à escola do diretor
          
      33.

                unless @document.school == current_user.school
          
      34.

              def create

                @document.school = current_user.school

    45.

    47. 
            

            

                if @document.save

              end

              def download
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                @document = Document.find(params[:id])
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # Verificar se o documento pertence à escola do diretor
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                unless @document.school == current_user.school
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_documents_path, alert: "Documento não encontrado."
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  return
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                if @document.respond_to?(:file) && @document.file.present?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  if @document.file.respond_to?(:download)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    send_data @document.file.download,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                              filename: @document.file.filename.to_s,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                              type: @document.file.content_type,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                              disposition: "attachment"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  elsif @document.file.respond_to?(:path)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    send_file @document.file.path,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                              filename: @document.title + File.extname(@document.file.path),
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                              type: @document.file.content_type || "application/octet-stream",
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                              disposition: "attachment"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  else
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    redirect_to direction_document_path(@document), alert: "Arquivo não disponível para download."
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_document_path(@document), alert: "Nenhum arquivo anexado a este documento."
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              private
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123.

              def document_params
          
      124.

                params.require(:document).permit(:title, :description, :document_type, :file)

    125.

            end

              def set_message

      131.

    app/controllers/direction/reports_controller.rb

            class Direction::ReportsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

              before_action :ensure_direction!

      5.

              def index

                @school = current_user.school

    8. 
            

            

                # Relatórios de alunos
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @students_report = {
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student").count,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  by_classroom: classroom_student_stats
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Relatórios de professores
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @teachers_report = {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher").count,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  subjects_assigned: teacher_subject_stats
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Relatórios acadêmicos
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @academic_report = {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate: calculate_school_attendance_rate,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  average_grades: calculate_school_average_grades
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              def attendance_report
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                @classrooms = @school.classrooms.includes(:students)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = params[:classroom_id].present? ? @school.classrooms.find(params[:classroom_id]) : nil
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @date_from = params[:date_from].present? ? Date.parse(params[:date_from]) : 1.month.ago.to_date
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @date_to = params[:date_to].present? ? Date.parse(params[:date_to]) : Date.current
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Dados de frequência
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                if @selected_classroom
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  @attendance_data = attendance_data_for_classroom(@selected_classroom, @date_from, @date_to)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  @attendance_data = attendance_data_for_school(@date_from, @date_to)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def grades_report
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @classrooms = @school.classrooms.includes(:students, :subjects)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = params[:classroom_id].present? ? @school.classrooms.find(params[:classroom_id]) : nil
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @selected_subject = params[:subject_id].present? ? Subject.find(params[:subject_id]) : nil
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Dados de notas
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if @selected_classroom
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  @grades_data = grades_data_for_classroom(@selected_classroom, @selected_subject)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                else
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  @grades_data = grades_data_for_school(@selected_subject)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              def student_bulletin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                @student = params[:student_id].present? ? User.find(params[:student_id]) : nil
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                @students = @school.students.order(:full_name)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                if @student
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  @bulletin_data = generate_student_bulletin(@student)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def performance_stats
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                @performance_data = {
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  grade_distribution: calculate_grade_distribution,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  attendance_trends: calculate_attendance_trends,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  subject_performance: calculate_subject_performance,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  classroom_comparison: calculate_classroom_comparison
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              def generate_pdf
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # Coletar dados para o PDF
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                @students_report = {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student").count,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  by_classroom: classroom_student_stats
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                @teachers_report = {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher").count,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  subjects_assigned: teacher_subject_stats
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                @academic_report = {
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate: calculate_school_attendance_rate,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  average_grades: calculate_school_average_grades
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  format.pdf do
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    render pdf: "relatorio_geral_#{@school.name.parameterize}_#{Date.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')}",
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                           template: "direction/reports/generate_pdf",
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                           layout: "pdf",
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                           page_size: "A4",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                           margin: { top: 20, bottom: 20, left: 15, right: 15 },
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                           header: { html: { template: "shared/pdf_header" } },
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                           footer: { html: { template: "shared/pdf_footer" } }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  format.html do
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    # Fallback para HTML se PDF não funcionar
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    render :index
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Erro na geração de PDF: #{e.message}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                redirect_to direction_reports_path, alert: "Erro ao gerar PDF. Tente novamente."
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              private
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def classroom_student_stats
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                Classroom.where(school_id: current_user.school.id)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                         .left_joins(:students)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                         .group("classrooms.name")
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                         .count("users.id")
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              def teacher_subject_stats
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "teacher")
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    .joins("LEFT JOIN subjects ON subjects.user_id = users.id")
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    .group("users.first_name", "users.last_name")
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    .count("subjects.id")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              def calculate_school_attendance_rate
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # Calculate based on absences vs total possible class days for students
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                students = User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "student")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                return 0 if students.empty?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:student)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                                       .where("date >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # Estimate total possible attendances (students * school days in period)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                school_days_in_period = 22 # approximate school days in 30 days
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                total_possible_attendances = students.count * school_days_in_period
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_possible_attendances.zero?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_attendances - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_attendances * 100).round(1)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              def calculate_school_average_grades
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                Grade.joins(:student)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                     .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                     .where("grades.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                     .average(:value)&.round(2) || 0
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def attendance_data_for_classroom(classroom, date_from, date_to)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                students = classroom.students
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                attendance_data = {}
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                students.each do |student|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  absences = student.absences.where(date: date_from..date_to).count
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  total_days = (date_to - date_from).to_i + 1
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = ((total_days - absences).to_f / total_days * 100).round(1)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  attendance_data[student.full_name] = {
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    absences: absences,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    total_days: total_days
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  }
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                attendance_data
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def attendance_data_for_school(date_from, date_to)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:students).map do |classroom|
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  students_data = attendance_data_for_classroom(classroom, date_from, date_to)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  average_attendance = students_data.values.map { |data| data[:attendance_rate] }.sum / students_data.size if students_data.any?
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    classroom_name: classroom.name,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    students_count: students_data.size,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    average_attendance: average_attendance&.round(1) || 0,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    students_data: students_data
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  }
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              def grades_data_for_classroom(classroom, subject = nil)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                query = Grade.joins(:user)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                             .where(users: { classroom_id: classroom.id })
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                query = query.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { id: subject.id }) if subject
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                grades = query.includes(:user, :subject)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                grades.group_by(&:user).map do |student, student_grades|
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    student_name: student.full_name,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    grades: student_grades.map { |g| { subject: g.subject.name, grade: g.value } },
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    average: student_grades.sum(&:value) / student_grades.size.to_f
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              def grades_data_for_school(subject = nil)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:students).map do |classroom|
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  classroom_grades = grades_data_for_classroom(classroom, subject)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  average_grade = classroom_grades.map { |data| data[:average] }.sum / classroom_grades.size if classroom_grades.any?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  {
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    classroom_name: classroom.name,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    students_count: classroom_grades.size,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    average_grade: average_grade&.round(1) || 0,
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    students_data: classroom_grades
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  }
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              def generate_student_bulletin(student)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                return nil unless student.classroom && student.school_id == current_user.school.id
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                classroom = student.classroom
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                subjects = classroom.subjects.includes(:grades, :absences)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                bulletin_data = {
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  student: student,
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  classroom: classroom,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  subjects_data: []
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                }
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                subjects.each do |subject|
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  student_grades = subject.grades.where(user: student)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  student_absences = subject.absences.where(user: student).count
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  average_grade = student_grades.any? ? student_grades.average(:value).round(1) : 0
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  bulletin_data[:subjects_data] << {
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                    subject_name: subject.name,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    grades: student_grades.pluck(:value),
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    average: average_grade,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    absences: student_absences,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    teacher: subject.user&.full_name
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  }
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                bulletin_data

    254. 
            

            

              end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              def calculate_grade_distribution
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                Grade.joins(:user)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                     .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                     .group("CASE
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 9 THEN '9-10'
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 7 THEN '7-8.9'
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 5 THEN '5-6.9'
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                               ELSE 'Abaixo de 5'
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                             END")
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                     .count
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

              end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_trends
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                3.downto(0).map do |months_ago|
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  start_date = months_ago.months.ago.beginning_of_month
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  end_date = months_ago.months.ago.end_of_month
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  month_name = start_date.strftime("%B/%Y")
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = calculate_month_attendance_rate(start_date, end_date)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  { month: month_name, attendance_rate: attendance_rate }
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

              end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

              def calculate_month_attendance_rate(start_date, end_date)
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "student").count
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_students.zero?
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:user)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                                       .where(date: start_date..end_date)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                days_in_period = (end_date.to_date - start_date.to_date).to_i + 1
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                expected_presences = total_students * days_in_period
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                return 95.0 if total_absences.zero?
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                [ 100.0 - (total_absences.to_f / expected_presences * 100), 0 ].max.round(1)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

              end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

              def calculate_subject_performance
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                Subject.joins(classroom: :school)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                       .where(schools: { id: current_user.school.id })
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                       .joins("LEFT JOIN grades ON subjects.id = grades.subject_id")
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                       .group("subjects.name")
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                       .average("grades.value")
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                       .transform_values { |avg| avg&.round(1) || 0 }
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_comparison
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:grades).map do |classroom|
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                  grades = classroom.grades
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  average_grade = grades.any? ? grades.average(:value).round(1) : 0
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                  students_count = classroom.students.count
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  {
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                    name: classroom.name,
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                    average_grade: average_grade,
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                    students_count: students_count
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  }
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                end
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

              end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

            end
          
      319.

              def index

                @students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student")

                               .includes(:classroom)

                                             "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")

              def show

              def set_student
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @user = User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "student", id: params[:id])

                           .first

            class MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :set_message, only: [ :show, :destroy ]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @sent_messages = current_user.sent_messages.recent.includes(:recipient)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @received_messages = current_user.received_messages.recent.includes(:sender)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @unread_count = current_user.received_messages.unread.count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              end
          
      10.

    11. 
            

            

              def show
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @message.mark_as_read! if @message.recipient == current_user
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              def new
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @message = Message.new
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                @recipients = available_recipients
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              def create
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build(message_params)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                @message.school = current_user.school
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                if @message.save
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  @recipients = available_recipients

      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

              end

              def destroy

                @message.destroy

    34. 
            

            

                redirect_to messages_path, notice: "Mensagem excluída com sucesso."
