    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36.

              private

    38.

    39. 
            

            

              def set_message
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                @message = Message.where(
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  "(sender_id = ? OR recipient_id = ?)",
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  current_user.id, current_user.id
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                ).find(params[:id])
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def message_params
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                params.require(:message).permit(:recipient_id, :subject, :body)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              def available_recipients
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                case current_user.user_type
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                when "admin"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  User.where.not(id: current_user.id)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  current_user.school.users.where.not(id: current_user.id)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                when "teacher"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  # Professores podem enviar para direção e alunos de suas turmas
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  classroom_ids = current_user.teacher_subjects.pluck(:classroom_id)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  student_ids = User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student").pluck(:id)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  direction_ids = current_user.school.directions.pluck(:id)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  User.where(id: student_ids + direction_ids)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                when "student"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Alunos podem enviar para professores de suas matérias e direção
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  return User.none unless current_user.classroom
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  teacher_ids = current_user.classroom.subjects.pluck(:user_id)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  direction_ids = current_user.school.directions.pluck(:id)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  User.where(id: teacher_ids + direction_ids)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                else
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  User.none
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end

            class Students::AbsencesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_student
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @absences = current_user.absences.includes(:subject)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                                       .order(date: :desc)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Resumo de faltas por disciplina
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @absence_summary = @absences.group(:subject_id).group(:justified).count
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                            .each_with_object({}) do |((subject_id, justified), count), hash|
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  hash[subject_id] ||= { total: 0, justified: 0, unjustified: 0 }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  hash[subject_id][:total] += count
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if justified
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    hash[subject_id][:justified] += count
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  else
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    hash[subject_id][:unjustified] += count
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

    25.

            class Students::GradesController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

              before_action :ensure_student!

    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                return redirect_to students_dashboard_path, alert: "Você não está em nenhuma turma." unless current_user.classroom
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @grade_types = [ "1º Bimestre", "2º Bimestre", "3º Bimestre", "4º Bimestre" ]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @grades_by_subject = {}
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if current_user.classroom&.subjects&.any?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  current_user.classroom.subjects.each do |subject|
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    @grades_by_subject[subject] = current_user.grades
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                                              .where(subject: subject)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                                              .group(:bimester)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                                                              .average(:value)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  end

                # Calcular média geral

              def classes_today

              def calculate_average_grade
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Calculate average grade across all teacher's subjects
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: @teacher.id })
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                return nil if grades.empty?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                grades.average(:value)&.round(2)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Calculate attendance rate across all teacher's students
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                classroom_ids = @teacher.teacher_classrooms.pluck(:id)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student").count
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                return nil if total_students.zero?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: @teacher.id }).count
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                total_possible_classes = total_students * @teacher.teacher_subjects.count * 30 # Assume 30 classes per subject per month
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                return nil if total_possible_classes.zero?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_classes - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_classes * 100).round(2)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            end
          
      57.

              def send_to_student

      45.

                message = create_message_to_user(student, params[:content], params[:subject])
          
      46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                if message.persisted?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  render json: { status: "success", message: "Mensagem enviada para o aluno." }

              def send_to_classroom

              def create_message_to_user(recipient, content, subject)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                current_user.sent_messages.create(

    110. 
            

            

                  recipient: recipient,

    111.

    112.

    113.

      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                )

    115. 
            

            

              end

              def available_classrooms

              def calculate_student_performance(students, subject)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                students.map do |student|
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  grades = student.grades.where(subject: subject)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  absences = student.absences.where(subject: subject)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    total_grades: grades.count,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    total_absences: absences.count,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: calculate_attendance_rate(student, subject)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

              def calculate_classroom_performance(students, subjects)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                subjects.map do |subject|
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  subject_students = students.where(classroom: subject.classroom)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  grades = Grade.where(subject: subject, student: subject_students)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    subject: subject,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    students_count: subject_students.count,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    grades_count: grades.count
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                end
          
      107.

              end
          
      108.

              def calculate_subject_attendance(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                students = subject.students
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                absences = Absence.where(
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  subject: subject,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  student: students,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  date: start_date..end_date
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                )
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                students.map do |student|
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  student_absences = absences.where(student: student).count
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  total_classes = calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = total_classes > 0 ? ((total_classes - student_absences) * 100.0 / total_classes) : 100
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  {
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    absences: student_absences,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    total_classes: total_classes,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate.round(1)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_attendance(classroom, subjects, start_date, end_date)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                classroom.students.map do |student|
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  total_absences = 0
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  total_classes = 0
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  subjects.each do |subject|
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    absences = Absence.where(
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      subject: subject,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      student: student,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      date: start_date..end_date
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    ).count
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    classes = calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    total_absences += absences
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    total_classes += classes
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = total_classes > 0 ? ((total_classes - total_absences) * 100.0 / total_classes) : 100
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      153.

      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154.

      155.

      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156.

      157.

                end

              end

              def calculate_subject_grades(subject)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.where(subject: subject).includes(:student)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                {
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  subject: subject,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  total_grades: grades.count,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  highest_grade: grades.maximum(:value) || 0,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  lowest_grade: grades.minimum(:value) || 0,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  students_with_grades: grades.distinct.count(:student_id)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173.

              def calculate_classroom_grades(classroom, subjects)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                subjects.map do |subject|

                  calculate_subject_grades(subject)

      178.

              def calculate_attendance_rate(student, subject)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # Lógica simplificada - pode ser melhorada
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                total_classes = 40 # Aproximação baseada no semestre
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                absences = student.absences.where(subject: subject).count
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                ((total_classes - absences) * 100.0 / total_classes).round(1)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                # Lógica simplificada - contar aulas baseado na grade horária
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Pode ser melhorada com um sistema mais preciso de controle de aulas
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                weeks = ((end_date - start_date) / 7).ceil
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                classes_per_week = subject.class_schedules.count
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                weeks * classes_per_week
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def render_pdf(template_name)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Implementação de geração de PDF seria aqui
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                # Por enquanto, redireciona para HTML
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                redirect_to teachers_reports_path, notice: "Visualização em PDF em desenvolvimento."
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            end
          
      200.

              def calculate_average(student, subject = nil)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                grades = subject ? student.grades.where(subject: subject) : student.grades

              def event_status_color(event)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if event.end_date && event.end_date < Date.current
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  "secondary"  # Evento passado
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                elsif event.start_date == Date.current
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  "success"    # Evento hoje
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                elsif event.start_date > Date.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  "primary"    # Evento futuro
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  "warning"    # Evento em andamento
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

            class Absence < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :student, class_name: "User", foreign_key: "user_id"
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :subject
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              delegate :school, to: :subject

              validates :date, presence: true

    8. 
            

            

              validate :student_must_be_student

              validate :date_cannot_be_future

              scope :justified, -> { where(justified: true) }

              scope :unjustified, -> { where(justified: false) }

              def student_must_be_student

                errors.add(:student, "deve ser um aluno") unless student&.student?

              def student_belongs_to_subject_classroom

                return unless student&.student? && subject&.classroom_id

                if student.classroom_id != subject.classroom_id
          
      27.

                  errors.add(:student, "deve pertencer à turma da disciplina")
          
      28.

              def weekday_name

      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                when 0 then "Domingo"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                when 1 then "Segunda-feira"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

    27. 
            

            

                when 3 then "Quarta-feira"

    28. 
            

            

                when 4 then "Quinta-feira"

    29.

    30.

    31. 
            

            

                else "Dia não definido"

              def self.grid_for_classroom(classroom)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                schedules = for_classroom(classroom).active.includes(:subject)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                grid = {}
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                (1..6).each do |day|
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80.

              def self.schedule_for_teacher(teacher)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: teacher.id }).active.order(:weekday, :start_time)

    86. 
            

            

              end

              def end_time_after_start_time
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                return unless start_time && end_time

              def subject_belongs_to_classroom

                # Verifica se a disciplina pertence à mesma escola da turma

              def no_time_conflict

                return unless classroom && weekday && start_time && end_time

                conflicting = ClassSchedule.where(

                ).where.not(id: id).where(
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  "(start_time < ? AND end_time > ?) OR (start_time < ? AND end_time > ?) OR (start_time >= ? AND end_time <= ?)",
          
      116.

      120.

    121. 
            

            

                if conflicting.exists?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122.

      123.

    app/models/classroom.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    45 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 45 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class Classroom < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :school
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              has_many :students, -> { where(user_type: "student") }, class_name: "User", foreign_key: "classroom_id", dependent: :nullify
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              has_many :subjects, dependent: :destroy
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              has_many :class_schedules, dependent: :destroy
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              has_many :teachers, through: :subjects, source: :user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              has_many :grades, through: :subjects
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              has_many :absences, through: :subjects
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              validates :name, :academic_year, :shift, :level, presence: true
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              validates :name, uniqueness: { scope: :school_id }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              validates :academic_year, numericality: { greater_than: 2000, less_than_or_equal_to: Date.current.year + 1 }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              enum :shift, { morning: "morning", afternoon: "afternoon", evening: "evening" }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              enum :level, {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                elementary_1: "elementary_1",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                elementary_2: "elementary_2",
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                high_school: "high_school"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              }

              def average_attendance_rate
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                return 0 if students.empty?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                total_classes = subjects.sum(:workload)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_classes.zero?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                total_absences = absences.count
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                total_possible_attendances = students.count * total_classes
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_possible_attendances.zero?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_attendances - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_attendances * 100).round(2)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            end

              def number_to_human_size(size)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                units = %w[B KB MB GB TB]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                unit = 0
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                while size >= 1024 && unit < units.length - 1
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  size /= 1024.0
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  unit += 1
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                "#{size.round(1)} #{units[unit]}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            end
          
      73.

              def end_date_after_start_date

              def attendance_rate
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                return 100.0 if students.empty?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                total_possible_attendances = students.count * workload
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                return 100.0 if total_possible_attendances.zero?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                total_absences = absences.count
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_attendances - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_attendances * 100).round(2)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49.

              def classroom_name

              def teacher_must_be_teacher

              def self.notify_attendance_alert(student, absences_count)

      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def self.notify_calendar_update(calendar_event, users)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                users.find_each do |user|
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    sender: User.admins.first,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    title: "Atualização no calendário",
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    content: "O calendário acadêmico foi atualizado. Verifique as novas datas e eventos.",
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "calendar_update",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    metadata: { calendar_event_id: calendar_event&.id }
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  )
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def self.notify_system_maintenance(title, content, scheduled_time = nil)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                User.all.find_each do |user|
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    sender: User.admins.first,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    content: content,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "system_maintenance",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    metadata: { scheduled_time: scheduled_time }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  )
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            end
          
      139.
